Module com.groupthree.mancala
Package com.groupthree.mancala.repository

Class StatManager

java.lang.Object
com.groupthree.mancala.repository.StatManager
public class StatManager extends Object
A utility class which acts as a repository for all game stats within the application This class is a singleton and as such there will ever be one instance of the class within the lifetime of the application
Version:
1.0
Author:
mofe

      public void updatePowerUpUseCount(PowerUp powerUp, int count)
      Update the use count for a specific power up
      Parameters:
      powerUp - PowerUp the power up for which we want to increase the count
      count - the amount by which we want the increase the power up count
